Title: The Nanny
Writer: Matthew Allen (Additional Screenwriter), Ed Dougherty, Marcel Sarmiento
Actors: Jaime Murray, Nicholas Brendon, Schuyler Fisk, Jennifer Marshall
Plot: A young girl, Noa, suspects her new nanny isn't from this world. Noa fights to reveal the nanny's identity, which is more twisted than she imagined in this dark fantasy tale.
